library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

df <- data.frame(
x = (1:137),
abs = c(10.0,16.0,21.0,25.0,28.0,30.0,32.0,34.0,36.0,38.0,40.0,41.0,42.0,43.0,45.0,46.0,47.0,48.0,48.0,49.0,50.0,51.0,52.0,52.0,53.0,54.0,54.0,54.0,55.0,55.0,56.0,56.0,56.0,57.0,57.0,57.0,58.0,58.0,58.0,58.0,59.0,59.0,59.0,59.0,59.0,59.0,60.0,60.0,60.0,60.0,60.0,60.0,60.0,60.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,61.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0,62.0),

)

df_long <- df %>%
pivot_longer(-x, names_to = "Variable", values_to = "Wert")

ggplot(df_long, aes(x=x, y=Wert, color=Variable)) +
geom_line(size=1) +
facet_wrap(~Variable, scales="free_y", ncol=1) +
theme_minimal()
